content: Hey @WG-async-foundations -- I think that https://github.com/rust-lang/wg-async-foundations/pull/93 is basically ready to merge. Thoughts?

My only critique is that there is maybe a moral that could be improved, but I can't quite think how to phrase it -- it feels like there's a need for environmental parameters, is the best way i can say it, that isn't well served by the way that async fn capture all of their parameters.
@Esteban KÃ¼ber -- this is the story I was thinking of earlier. See my comment here
I left some comments. I don't think it's quite ready.
